channel.title: [PI] NPC Question. Rep+ [PI]
channel.description:
I'm trying to add a new Boolean for my tutorial Island, can someone help me?
Iv'e added this so far:
Under: [code]public class Client extends Player {[/code] in client.java (server sided)
Then Direcly under that I put [code]public boolean killedRat = false;[/code]
Then in ActionHandler.java I put [code]case 944: if (c.playerRights == 0 && killedRat == true) c.getDH().sendDialogues(46,npcType); else c.getDH().sendDialogues(45,npcType); break;[/code]
All - In - All i'm trying to make the player kill one of the rats in order to pass that part of the Tutorial, what am I doing wrong?

item.title: [PI] NPC Question. Rep+ [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Jay Sir Jay
item.description:
@Sir_Jay wrote:

Never worked with PI neither am I trying to give you false information but I am assuming that when a NPC dies, it drops something and assigns it to the player before anyone else… that has to be MADE so I am just taking a guess and telling you to find out where the NPC dropping method is and work on it from there, like make the npc == ratid and give the player a killedRat = true boolean.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] NPC Question. Rep+ [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Typhis Lord Typhis
item.description:
@Lord_Typhis wrote:

Sir Jay:

You would need to make it so when the player kills the rat the boolean returns true so the dialogue can work for the player o.O

Thats my question, I have no idea how to do that.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] NPC Question. Rep+ [PI]

item.description:
@Sir_Jay wrote:

item.title: [PI] NPC Question. Rep+ [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Typhis Lord Typhis
item.description:
@Lord_Typhis wrote:

I’m trying to add a new Boolean for my tutorial Island, can someone help me?

Iv’e added this so far:

Under:

public class Client extends Player {

in client.java (server sided)

Then Direcly under that I put

public boolean killedRat = false;

Then in ActionHandler.java I put

case 944: if (c.playerRights == 0 && killedRat == true) c.getDH().sendDialogues(46,npcType); else c.getDH().sendDialogues(45,npcType); break;

All - In - All i’m trying to make the player kill one of the rats in order to pass that part of the Tutorial, what am I doing wrong?
